snippet.title: OtherLevels Holdings Limited (ASX:OLV) Adds Another UK Real-Money Wagering Client
snippet.content:
Sydney, Aug 2, 2017 AEST (ABN Newswire) - OtherLevels Holdings Limited (ASX:OLV) ("OtherLevels") is pleased to announce that it has signed another significant U.K. based licenced wagering operator. The client, a licenced wagering operator with a growing global presence, will commence with multiple OtherLevels messaging formats including web push, app push and interstitials. The initial transaction exceeds A$50,000. Brendan O'Kane, OtherLevels Managing Director commented, "While the client details are confidential, it is exciting to see a new client embrace both app and desktop messaging from the outset. This confirms OtherLevels proposition that we can help our clients reach 100% of their audience, regardless of whether the player is web or app based, and reflects a growing understanding of the different types of messaging solutions that OtherLevels delivers. We are excited to further expand our presence in the sector, and will be further showcasing OtherLevels capabilities for wagering operators, at the GWRA Conference in Sydney in August, and the Betting on Sports Conference in London in September". About Otherlevels Holdings Ltd () (FRA:7OL) is a leading second-generation digital marketing platform with offices in the United States, United Kingdom and Australia. OtherLevels is at the forefront of the enterprise marketing transformation being driven by the massive shift to mobile.
The OtherLevels digital marketing platform enables marketers to engage and retain their audience across desktop, mobile web and apps.
